pr_title: Setting appropriate defaults for AWS S3 dist config, matching the docs

timeline.message: Setting appropriate defaults for AWS S3 dist config, matching the docs
Setting appropriate defaults for AWS S3 dist config, matching the docs

timeline.bodyText:
Maybe explicitly state what the default value is. We so that at many other places by now:

  
    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            #org.opencastproject.assetmanager.aws.s3.path.style=false
          
          
            
            # Default: false
          
          
            
            #org.opencastproject.assetmanager.aws.s3.path.style=false
timeline.author: lkiesow
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -26,5 +26,5 @@ org.opencastproject.assetmanager.aws.s3.enabled=false
 # Enable path-style for URL adressing
 # Leave this commented out to use the default style for AWS S3
 # If you are using another S3 service/provider, please refer to its documentation.
-#org.opencastproject.assetmanager.aws.s3.path.style=true
+#org.opencastproject.assetmanager.aws.s3.path.style=false

timeline.author: lkiesow
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -42,6 +42,6 @@ org.opencastproject.distribution.aws.s3.distribution.enable=false

 # Leave this commented out to use the default style for AWS S3
 # If you are using another S3 service/provider, please refer to its documentation.
-#org.opencastproject.distribution.aws.s3.path.style=true
+#org.opencastproject.distribution.aws.s3.path.style=false
